charges.charge_disposition: Defendant placed on one year probation; defendant shall pay a fine of $250.00 due immediately to the Clerk of the Court for the US District court; defendant shallpay a special assessment fee of $25.00 due immediately; defendant shall participate in 50 hours of community service as direceted by the US Probation Office; defendant shall remain on supervised release until the $250.00 is paid in full; defendant shall notify the Clerk of the Court for the USDC, District of Columbia, within 30 days of any change of address until such time the financial obligation is paid in full. (1)
